headline: 132nd Common Stock Monthly Dividend Increase Declared by Realty Income
summary: Realty Income Corporation (Realty Income, NYSE: O), The Monthly Dividend Company®, today announced it has declared an increase in the company's common stock monthly cash dividend to $0.2695 per share from $0.2690 per share. The dividend is payable on October 15, 2025, to stockholders of record as of October 1, 2025. The new monthly dividend represents an annualized dividend amount of $3.234 per share as compared to the prior annualized dividend amount of $3.228 per share.

headline: Is Realty Income Stock Underperforming the Dow?
summary: As Realty Income has underperformed the Dow recently, analysts remain cautious about the stock’s prospects.

headline: What Is the Highest Realty Income Stock Has Ever Been?
summary: Realty Income is roughly 25% below its all-time high. This could be a good buying opportunity for long-term income investors.
